text: Minion(s) may refer to: *Minions (Despicable Me) *Minion, the title character's best friend from the animated movie Megamind *Minions, Blair Waldorf's followers at in the television show Gossip Girl *Minions (movie), a 2015 animated movie *Minions: The Rise of Gru, a 2022 animated movie == Related pages == *Minyan
title: Minion
